TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ArrayExtension extends System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtension

summary.span: 实现对 .NET Framework XAML 服务的 支持

span.span: Implements support for .NET Framework XAML Services

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是实现`x:Array`标记扩展行为的类, 以及来自 [ms-chap `x:ArrayExtension` ] 的信息项。 is the class that implements the `x:Array` markup extension behavior, and the `x:ArrayExtension` information item from [MS-XAML]. `x:Array`支持 XAML 语言功能, 该功能允许通过特定的标记扩展启用语法在数组中添加任意子元素。`x:Array` supports a XAML language feature that allows adding arbitrary child elements within an array, through a particular markup extension enabled syntax. 标记扩展语法需要标记扩展用法上的显式特性和用于指定的内容语法。The markup extension syntax requires an explicit attribute on the markup extension usage, and a content syntax for specifying the . 有关语法的详细信息和详细信息, 请参阅[X:Array 标记扩展](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-array-markup-extension.md)。For more information and details on the syntax, see [x:Array Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-array-markup-extension.md). 此类是一个标记扩展实现。This class is a markup extension implementation. 标记扩展类的主要目的是为 XAML 处理器实现的某个方面提供基础结构支持, 并且通常不会从用户代码中调用标记扩展类公开的成员。Markup extension classes exist mainly to provide infrastructure support for some aspect of a XAML processor implementation, and the members exposed by a markup extension class are not typically called from user code. 此扩展插件支持 xaml 的 .NET Framework XAML 服务实现的 xaml 及其 XAML 读取器和 XAML 编写器的[X:Array 标记扩展](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-array-markup-extension.md)用法。This extension supports the [x:Array Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-array-markup-extension.md) usage from XAML for .NET Framework XAML Services implementation of XAML and its XAML readers and XAML writers. 在 .NET Framework 的以前版本中, 此类存在于 WPF 特定的程序集 PresentationFramework 中。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly PresentationFramework.dll. 从 .NET Framework 4 开始, 位于 system.exception 程序集中。Starting with the .NET Framework 4, is in the System.Xaml assembly. 这使`x:Array`使用情况可用于框架或技术, 如 .NET Framework XAML 服务上构建 Windows Workflow Foundation。This makes the `x:Array` usage available to frameworks or technologies such as Windows Workflow Foundation that are built on .NET Framework XAML Services. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md)。For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md). System.exception 程序集使用将类型从程序集的 CLR 命名空间映射到 xaml 语言的 xaml 命名空间 ([!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xamlxmlnsv1](~/includes/tlasharptla-xamlxmlnsv1-md.md)])。The System.Xaml assembly uses to map types from the CLR namespace in the assembly to the XAML namespace for the XAML language ([!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xamlxmlnsv1](~/includes/tlasharptla-xamlxmlnsv1-md.md)]). 在典型的 XAML 标记中, 在根元素[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xamlxmlnsv1](~/includes/tlasharptla-xamlxmlnsv1-md.md)]映射中声明前缀, 并使用前缀。 `x`In typical XAML markup, you declare a prefix for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xamlxmlnsv1](~/includes/tlasharptla-xamlxmlnsv1-md.md)] in a root element mapping and use the prefix `x`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法支持标记扩展行为, 通常不会由用户代码调用, 除非用户代码实现 XAML 处理行为。This method supports markup extension behavior and is not typically called by user code, unless that user code implements XAML processing behavior.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不应直接调用, 并且不参与任何现有的 .net 解释`x:Array`标记扩展行为。This method is not intended to be called directly, and does not participate in any existing .NET interpretation of the `x:Array` markup extension behavior. 对后备数组实例的任何代码访问都应该使用数组 Api 或语言功能来实现。Any code access to the backing array instance should be done with array APIs or language features. 任何替代的 xaml 读取器或 xaml 编写器实现应改为使用 .net System .xaml 服务扩展 , 如确定要调用的方法, 或一起使用适当的接口强制转换。Any alternative XAML reader or XAML writer implementations should instead use the .NET System.Xaml service extensions such as to determine what method to call, or together with appropriate interface casting.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是的特性化 XAML 内容属性。 is the attributed XAML content property of . XAML 内容属性指定支持在 XAML 中将数组的项元素指定为子对象元素的典型 XAML 用法。XAML content property designation supports the typical XAML usage of specifying the item elements of an array as child object elements in XAML. 是对内部`ArrayExtension.Items`属性的对象模型和标记扩展实现公开, 如在 [ms-chap `x:ArrayExtension` ] 中定义的。 is the object model and markup extension implementation exposure for the intrinsic `ArrayExtension.Items` property, as defined for `x:ArrayExtension` in [MS-XAML]. 在调用之前 ,不会将和中的项的类型不匹配 (或任何其他验证问题) 报告为异常。Type mismatches between and the items in , or any other validation issues, are not reported as exceptions until is invoked. 此行为与 XAML 标记扩展的常规设计原则一致。This behavior is consistent with the general design principles of XAML markup extensions. 有关 XAML 使用情况的信息, 请参阅[X:Array 标记扩展](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-array-markup-extension.md)。For XAML usage information, see [x:Array Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-array-markup-extension.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance object ProvideValue(class System.IServiceProvider serviceProvider) cil managed
Public Overrides Function ProvideValue (serviceProvider As IServiceProvider) As Object

param.name: serviceProvider
param.span: 可为标记扩展提供服务的对象。

span.span: An object that can provide services for the markup extension.

summary.span: 返回一个数组，其大小为 值中提供的对象数。

span.span: Returns an array that is sized to the number of objects supplied in the values.
The created array, or null.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法支持标记扩展行为, 通常不会由用户代码调用, 除非用户代码实现 XAML 处理行为。This method supports markup extension behavior and is not typically called by user code, unless that user code implements XAML processing behavior. XAML 处理器实现使用此方法在对象创建过程中`x:Array`正确地处理元素。A XAML processor implementation uses this method for proper handling of `x:Array` elements during object creation. 这依赖于 XAML 处理器在处理任何并调用其`ProvideValue`实现时的常规行为。This relies on general behavior for XAML processors when they process any and call its `ProvideValue` implementation. 此实现不依赖于所传递`serviceProvider`的任何服务。This implementation does not rely on any services based on the passed `serviceProvider`. 不过, 它确实依赖于在使用 .NET Framework XAML 服务的默认 XAML 架构上下文进行处理时, 由扩展使用传输的 CLR 概念。However, it does rely on CLR concepts as transmitted by the extension's use while processing with the default XAML schema context for .NET Framework XAML Services. 有关标记扩展的详细信息, 请参阅[XAML 的标记扩展概述](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/markup-extensions-for-xaml-overview.md)。For more information on markup extensions, see [Markup Extensions for XAML Overview](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/markup-extensions-for-xaml-overview.md).
